channel.title: Inquisitor (Blue Dragon Investigator) + Torturer (Black Rose Investigator)
channel.description:
Name: Inquisitor
Night Ability 1: Question You may select a player and an action type(Occupy, Kill, Defend, Convert, Investigate, or Other(this includes things like conversion), if that player is capable of performing that action type at night, you will know, however you won't know how(Ex. The Knight's "Cold Steel" appears the same as The Assassin's "Assassinate" and the Cult Leader's "Blood of Mithras")
Night Ability 2: The Rack (2 use) You may tie a player to the rack, occupying them
Objective: Standard Blue Dragon Objective
IF CONVERTED
Name: Torturer
Night Ability 1: Torture Learn a Player's Class Type
Objective: Standard Black Rose Objective
Lore: IDK
Comments: I just thought of the idea "what if you could check if a person could do a certain thing"

item.title: Inquisitor (Blue Dragon Investigator) + Torturer (Black Rose Investigator)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Name: Inquisitor

Night Ability 1: Question
You may select a player and an action type(Occupy, Kill, Defend, Convert, Investigate, or Other(this includes things like conversion), if that player is capable of performing that action type at night, you will know, however you won’t know how(Ex. The Knight’s “Cold Steel” appears the same as The Assassin’s “Assassinate” and the Cult Leader’s “Blood of Mithras”)

Night Ability 2: The Rack (2 use)
You may tie a player to the rack, occupying them

Objective: Standard Blue Dragon Objective
